alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 29 at 3:23AM CST until December 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WEST CENTRAL AND SOUTHWESTERN TEXAS PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In Texas...Hartley...Moore...Oldham...Potter... Deaf Smith...Randall and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 19 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3. * Timing...12 PM CST through 6 PM CST.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.

area.areaDesc: Deaf Smith; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
